item.title: How to get your identity tokens
item.description: This post has been ported from http://gbeeming.wordpress.com/2013/10/08/how-to-get-your-identity-tokens/.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Battling to Join Insider Preview?
item.description: Today I tried to join one of my machines to the insider preview. Most people if they get issues would probably take it as a sign that putting the broken bits on their machine was a bad idea and the universe has saved them…I need my broken bits fix .
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
